reviews.review: Shouldn't take you more than a few evenings to complete the single player, but this is a great game! Full of great challeneges that leave you with a real sense of achievement. The voice acting from Stephen Merchant is brilliant throughout and you will never have this much fun being insulted by robots
What the original Portal would(/should) have been like, had they intended to make it into a proper length game and not just a clever addition to their Orange Box.

The thing about puzzle games is they are not for everyone, being either too easy or too frustrating. But Portal 2 does a great job balancing and raising the difficulty between levels along with a developed story, good intelligent humor, and very innovative gameplay. Therefore, I highly recommend the game to everyone (not just puzzle gamers) for both single and multiplayer.

Es uno de los mejores y más brillantes, divertidos, difícles, profundos y hermosos juegos que jugué. Es un muy buen videojuego. Es imposible perderse de este juego, y de su primera parte. Si hay algo de lo que puedo recomendar, es que, por más que quieras, nunca juegues un juego de VALVe, porque te vas a enamorar de sus juegos, y vas a querer una tercera parte que no va a salir jamás, por desgracia. 


10/10

This game was truly amazing. Never, ever have I had a game move me so much like this one. The way the story is developed, with the old labs, and then going back and defeating the final boss. It just feels like a complete circle. The ending moved me to tears. It was so amazing. If you have the money, you need to get this game. Are the puzzles challenging? Yes. That's what a video game is. Can you get frustrated? A lot. It is all worth it in the end.

förrvirrande bra

One of the best games I'll ever play. Extremely gripping storyline, amazing puzzles which can take a while to solve. It had me so attached to it, with all the characters and tests, the voicelines and mystery. It includes past and futuristic elements, with many plot twists and exciting moments. After finishing the first and second game, I felt so empty inside that I went and bought the book, and every portal related game on steam. Cheers to everyone who is thinking of buying this. Go for it.

Well here we are again.  This is Portal 2.  I STILL LOVE THIS GAME!  So it's more of the same.  There is a larger cast of characters with one more who is Wheatly.  Not going to go into Wheatly in fear of spoilers but he is a personality core.  So there are more puzzles in this game along with the ability to make and upload your own test chambers to the Steam workshop.  Also with this update there is CO-OP GAMEPLAY!  So I have not finished the co-op gameplay, but so far it is fun with a friend.  As with the first one there the soundtrack is included for free and also the co-op is included free too.  So GLaDOS is still here and puts you through some tests.  Not going to go any further for, of course, spoilers.  I am in love with these games.  I just wish Valve could count to three.  This one includes some bonus challenge maps like the first one, but there are no achivements for those maps.  This one does include some more easter eggs and achievements for those achievement hunters.  So that's really it.

Simply one of the greatest games ever.
I recommend it for all those players, who enjoy challenging puzzles with a hilaroíous narration.
You can shoot portals and solve puzzles at the same time. Gnarly!

良心之作，解密类的经典作品。
本来是刚入坑steam的随手喜+1买的，没想到第一次玩就一下入迷了，一口气打了7章，大概用了两天的时间吧，真的是一口气然后就卡在了某一关，想了半个多小时都没想出来。这也正是这个游戏迷人的地方之一，有足够的难度让玩家去思考解法。后来过了很久上线又是一口气通了关。

整体来说，游戏的画面，剧情的节奏，人物的操作手感都很不错，谜题有一定难度，双人模式和朋友一起更有意思。后面很容易想不到解法，最主要的问题一般是不知道要干什么这里给个真诚的建议是要找到出口，根据出口和场景中的道具思考，也不是特别困难。
总之是很好的游戏，推荐入手。
Эта игра о дружбе, предательстве, мести. Практический всё что мы любим.

Interesting and very trippy puzzle game, some of the puzzles were also well thought out. Story didn't really grab my attention though, and I sometimes found the game to become a bit boring at some parts. Portal 2 can sometimes be challanging, but also sometimes quite easy. Never had to look up any guide, but I did have to think most of the times. At the beginning the characters were funny, but further in they became kind of annoying and lost their comedic value.

Pros
- Good graphics
- Co-op
- Community levels
- Story Driven
- Clever designed levels

Cons
- I found the main story a bit boring. It just didn't grab my attention.
- Characters might become boring and unfunny, and you might even be annoyed by them (him).

If you like puzzle games, I think 20 euro is just worth it, not more.
以前除了第一次玩CS会有头晕的感觉外，以后玩任何的FPS游戏都没有所谓的3D眩晕的情况。直到买了这个游戏和朋友联机肝了一个通宵后，躺在床上的我一直在思考三个问题：我是谁，我在哪，我为什么要玩传送门？

One of the best-selling games that Valve made. Portal 2 is a sequel to a great game, Portal, and kept its high qualities while having some new features to offer. The single player story line is a great continuation to Portal, exploring both the history of Aperature Science as well as GlaDos. The Coop levels are a fantastic way to spend time with your friends. 

A great game and would recommend to all.

The cake is a lie.

For the longest time I thought this was a shooter game and about 7 hours into this game I started to wonder how long the tutorial was x_x. I am really more of an Action, Adventure, and RPG Fan that pretty much go "Kill that guy, shoot him, level up, get better, play harder bosses, and etc", but I tried the co-op with my friend and it was pretty fun. We did a lot of brainstorming and eventually had to look up a few things on youtube. I really liked how it was challenging in a different way from other games such as CS:GO, TF2, Geometry Dash, Etc. where difficulty is how fast you can click a certain button combination or how you have to play like you have an extreme case of ADHD and drank 10 cups of coffee. In this game difficulty is thinking strategically, several steps ahead and planning out exactly what to do, thinking outside the box, playing out all posibilities in your head. Or you can just search Youtube, that works too. I would reccomend playing with a friend if you can. Overall 10/10 shootergame would infinitly fall again.

Il est bien avec une histoire qui tient debout  mais dommage qu'il n'y a pas plus de niveaux dans le co-op , Plus de objets, Plusieurs  fins dans le mode solo...  Quand le magasin sera-t-il Ouvert ?  


It is good with  a Standing Storybut  but pity that there are no more levels in the Coop, More items , more ends in the solo mod... When the store will be Open ?

An even better sequal to the first game! I loved the more indepth story and the new/old characters. And with adding more elements to use while solving the puzzles and different enviroments (and a few recognizable ones) it made the game even more fun/interesting to play.

Pros: 
- Great story arc starting with an escape, then takeover, then revenge.
- Straightforward controls and physics,
- Endurable dialouges,
- That feel when you complete a puzzle without a guide (or even with one)
- Lots o' easter eggs.
- Fun co-op.

Cons:
- Easy to get bored with repetitive puzzle elements.

8/10 would visit all of the Ratmann's dens.

One of the best puzzle games to ever exist with a fun story and an awkward silent protagonist. Co op mode is great. Get this game in the orange box bundle. 10/10 would search for cake again.

A brilliant game fit for every Steam library. By far one of the best games on Steam and arguably the best one Valve ever made. Simply put, it’s a must buy.

I am patiently awaiting any expansion to the Portal universe, whether that’s in the form of an merged title with the Half Life universe or a more standalone Portal 3. It saddens me to see Valve step away from game development and move towards the development of their distribution system, Steam.

My guess is this. I don't think they meant for the Perpetual Testing Initiative to be anything that substantial; just an add-on meant to make community maps more accessible and to prolong the life of the game. Instead, without any sign of a new game coming, it seems the system will live up to its name; with any new Portal content bound to only ever come through the initiative. 

Let's pray we see Portal 3 sometime in the future. I know I will be the first to pre-order it when it debuts. Please Valve. Make it happen.
